title: Carrot 🥕 Walnuts Cake With Wheat 🌾 Flour 🍞| Eggless | Healthy Diet| Kids 😀
content:
Carrot 🥕 Walnuts Cake : Eggless: Wheat flour cake 🌾 Duration: 40 mins Servings: 8 As you all know I started baking few months ago.. day to day I'm improving my baking skills and love to bake and decorate cake with frosting.. But today I made a simple healthy loaf cake as it's a big hit from many years, we can prepare it with simple home ingredients without egg and all purpose flour 🙂 Yes ! what you read is right, I prepared Eggless Carrot 🥕 Walnuts cake with wheat 🌾 flour 👌 Frankly saying it's my experiment with wheat flour, I never tried before but my goodness it turned out fluffy, soft and very delicate.. You can checkout my other baking recipes such as cookies and cakes, links shared at the end of post. Coming to Recipe, it's healthy and kids surely love it 😍  Hope you like too.. Happy Weekend 😊 Let's start with ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients: Dry ingredients:
  • Wheat Flour - 350 gms
  • Salt - 1/2 tsp
  • Sugar - 180 gms
  • Cane sugar - 80 gms
  • Baking soda - 3/4 tsp
Wet Ingredients:
  • Milk - 160 ml
  • Condensed Milk - 120 ml
  • Vanilla Essence - 1 tsp
  • Butter - melted - 113 gms
  • Canola Oil - 40 ml
  • Orange Zest - 1 tsp
Other:
  • Carrot - 1 - grated - 1 cup
  • Walnuts - chopped - 80 gms
  • Golden Raisins - 80 gms
Procedure:
  • In a large mixing bowl
  • Add butter and sugar ( 2 varieties of sugar )
  • Mix till incorporated
  • Add milk, vanilla essence and oil
  • Mix well till incorporated by using hand mixer
  • Next sieve all dry ingredients ( wheat flour, salt and baking soda)
  • Mix well with spatula
  • And final mix with hand mixer till combined
  • Next add grated Carrot 🥕, orange zest, walnuts and raisins
  • Mix well with spatula
  • Carrot walnuts cake batter is ready to bake
  • Pour batter in loaf cake mould lined with parchment paper
  • Preheat oven 375F / 190C and bake 40 mins
  • Insert toothpick or fork or knife at center when it comes out clean it baked well
  • It so fresh, soft and filled with lovely flavours. I hope you like it
  • Happy cooking and enjoy your day 🙂
Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  • Adjust sweetness according to taste
  • If you don't like raisins you can skip it/ you can add other dry fruits..
  • Store in an airtight container
  • Don't refrigerate, it might become hard
  • Serve with fresh homemade Ice cream Homemade Cone Ice Cream || 3 varieties || Vanilla Cone Ice Cream 🍦 | Christmas 🎄 sprinkles Cone Ice Cream | Red rainbow🌈 sprinkles Cone Ice Cream || Christmas Special 🎄
